attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Why do we have to pay more becasue of some demand made by the gas and electricity companies, I say we should lower the fuel and electricity prices and we can cut down the amount of homeless people and this would also lower the cost of living

rejection.details: There are many similar petitions, see http://search.petitions.pm.gov.uk/kbroker/number10/petitions/search.lsim?qt=fuel+duty&sr=0&nh=10&cs=&sc=number10&oq=audit+bank&sb=0&ha=1157&mt=0
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
